content: note on the pattern page scroll down and click on print pattern to download it drops 165-32 drops design pattern no fa-318 ---------------------------------------------------------- size s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl hip circumference approx 82-90-98-108-116-130 cm / 32¼ -35½ -38½ -42½ -45¾ -51½ note measure approx 10 cm / 4 below the belly button not at the broadest part because of rib the tights will contract but will be very elastic work in size you usually use materials drops fabel from garnstudio 350-400-450-500-500-550 g color no 904 lavender 1435-1640-1845-2050-2050-2255 metres drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 and 40 cm / 24 and 16 size 2 5 mm/ us 1 5 - or size needed to get 26 sts x 35 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm
